org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.MockMvcWebClientBuilder

Packages that use MockMvcWebClientBuilder
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit
Server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc and HtmlUnit.

    MockMvcWebClientBuilder.withDelegate(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient webClient)
